    java.util.ArrayList<Node> CategoryTree.treeToListCreateCategory​(java.lang.String language)
    Traverses all the CategoryTree and returns it as a list, but appends as first element a Node with a Category which name is "New Category" (also in it, es, de, and fr, depending on the language set by the user)
